author: goldiesebring

review: I bought it to watch Netflix outside the US, in a trip to Chile. Problems started when I created my Roku account outside US: no Netflix, No Amazon Prime, No almost any channel.After many forums in internet, I found a way to get Netflix and other channels using a US IP, buty only Netflix works in SouthAmerica.In fact, I bought it for Netflix, but I can't understand why you can't get the app in an easy way if the service is available in other countries: I have a chilean Netflix account and now works perfect, but it was too hard to make it works, so I disagree with the 'Roku dream' promised.And, by the way, you can't get the app for Apple/Android outside US either.
author: Sergio Valdes Hernandez "Normal guy"

review: When Netflix is on, the screensaver doesn't work right. It just goes to Netflix or Netflix kids menu (lots of red). If you have LCD/LED you're good, but old fashioned tvs or plasma beware!Otherwise it's great!  Remote works even though I can't see it behind TV, which makes it perfect fit in my house.

author: Nino Balducci "Nino"

review: I am obliged to write a negative review on my dead Roku streaming stick. It was always slow to react, and finally froze and died after about 3 months. Neither Amazon nor Roku was able to replace or refund the item. I am disappointed that it froze and was no longer useful. But, I went ahead and bought a Roku 2, and it searches much faster than the Stick ever did. The Roku 2 is pretty slow to come up to speed, and I have to re-power it every time is has been "off". Not what I expected.
